metadata.title: CVE-2020-25814 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In MediaWiki before 1.31.10 and 1.32.x through 1.34.x before 1.34.4, XSSrelated to jQuery can occur. The attacker creates a message with[javascript:payload xss] and turns it into a jQuery object withmw.message().parse(). The expected result is that the jQuery object doesnot contain an <a> tag (or it does not have a href attribute, or it'sempty, etc.). The actual result is that the object contains an <a href="javascript... that executes when clicked.

criterions.comment: mediawiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
